history.proof: intros a b Q H. qsimpl time: 1 use: Grobner_imp_SpolyQ. qsimpl time: 1 use: Grobner_imp_SpolyQ,ConfluentReduce_imp_Grobner. qsimpl time: 1 use: Reducef,Grobner_imp_SpolyQ,ConfluentReduce_imp_Grobner. qsimpl time: 1 use: Reducef,Grobner_imp_SpolyQ,ConfluentReduce_imp_Grobner. qsimpl time: 1 use: Reducef,Grobner_imp_SpolyQ,ConfluentReduce_imp_Grobner. apply rstar_rtopO. qsimpl time: 1 use: Reducef,Grobner_imp_SpolyQ,ConfluentReduce_imp_Grobner. - hauto q: on depth: 3use: Reducef, Grobner_imp_SpolyQ, ConfluentReduce_imp_Grobner. - sauto. - hauto drew: off depth: 3use: Reducef, Grobner_imp_SpolyQ, ConfluentReduce_imp_Grobner.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall a b : poly A0 eqA ltM, zerop b -> forall Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), red (spolyp a b) Q

Premises:
zerop = fun H' : poly A0 eqA ltM => let (x, x0) := H' in match x as l return (canonical A0 eqA ltM l -> Prop) with | nil => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil => True | a :: l => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a :: l) => False end x0 : poly A0 eqA ltM -> Prop
poly : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Set
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
Record Q : Set := Qmake { Qnum : BinNums.Z; Qden : BinNums.positive } Arguments QArith_base.Qmake _%Z_scope _%positive_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
red = fun (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) => reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (pO A n) : poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop Arguments red _ _%list_scope
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
spolyp = fun p q : poly A0 eqA ltM => let (x, x0) := p in (let (x, Cpx) := q in fun (x0 : list (Term A n)) (Cpx0 : canonical A0 eqA ltM x0) => exist (fun a : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM a) (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec x x0 Cpx Cpx0) (spolyf_canonical A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os
reduceplus_cb2_lem : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (x :: Q) a

reducestar_cb1 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (a :: Q) b

canonical_spminusf : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q)
reducestar_in_pO : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (pO A n)
reduce_in_pO : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p (pO A n)

nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]

canonical_spminusf_full_t : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q))

```coq
intros a b Q H.
pose proof (Grobner_imp_SpolyQ cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec) as H1.
pose proof (ConfluentReduce_imp_Grobner cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q) as H2.
pose proof (Reducef cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q b) as H3.
destruct H3 as [q H3].
apply H1.
apply H2.
apply H3.
Qed.

original: intros a b Q H. pose proof (Grobner_imp_SpolyQ cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec) as H1. pose proof (ConfluentReduce_imp_Grobner cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q) as H2. pose proof (Reducef cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q b) as H3. destruct H3 as [q H3]. apply H1. apply H2. apply H3.
